title: Adjust a PM Schedule
description: Based on usage data, a reliability engineer has determined that a PM task can be done less frequently. They need to adjust the schedule.

tasks.description: Locate the specific PM task in the maintenance plan for the asset.
Change the frequency of the PM from every 3 months to every 4 months.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the PM frequency in the system.

tasks.description: Recalculate the future PM due dates based on the new frequency.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the system has generated a new schedule of future PM dates.
